item.title: [PI] Lunars Fix (Rep++)
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

[quote=“Resent, post:1, topic:445846”]I’ve finally gotten lunars to work, but the only way to access them is to have ancients and then to get lunars. For example, normal magics to lunar magics won’t work, you need to get ancients first, and then get lunars.

Any idea on how to make it so you can get lunars from normal magics?[/quote]
hint: Actionhandler under firstclickobject

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Lunars Fix (Rep++)
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

I’ve finally gotten lunars to work, but the only way to access them is to have ancients and then to get lunars. For example, normal magics to lunar magics won’t work, you need to get ancients first, and then get lunars. When you try going from normal to lunars it says right away “You feel a drain in your memory.”

Any idea on how to make it so you can get lunars from normal magics?

Here is my code if it helps:

410: if (c.playerMagicBook == 0) { c.playerMagicBook = 2; c.setSidebarInterface(6, 29999); c.sendMessage("Lunar wisdom fills your mind."); c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } else { c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // modern c.playerMagicBook = 0; c.sendMessage("You feel a drain on your memory."); c.autocastId = -1; c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } break;

Read full topic
